title: DSCUNIDataSets: A Comprehensive Collection of University and Engineering Datasets
text: DSCUNIDataSets package provides curated collection datasets designed support research analysis various domains engineering, clustering, ordered regression studies. package includes datasets mechIng_df, contains mechanical engineering data used illustrate ordered isotonic regression, bolts_df, contains data experiments analyzing effects machine adjustments time count bolts. package intended researchers, analysts, practitioners require ready--use, high-quality datasets methodological exploration, statistical modeling, applied research. datasets maintained original form, ensuring data integrity, compatible standard R workflows.

title: DSCUNIDataSets: A Comprehensive Collection of University and Engineering Datasets
code: # Manually transform the data to long format using only dplyr mechIng_long <- bind_rows(   mechIng_df %>% select(x, value = g1) %>% mutate(group = "g1"),   mechIng_df %>% select(x, value = g2) %>% mutate(group = "g2") )  # Line plot comparing g1 and g2 as a function of x ggplot(mechIng_long, aes(x = x, y = value, color = group)) +   geom_line(size = 1) +   labs(     title = "Comparison of g1 and g2 as a Function of x",     x = "x (input variable)",     y = "Value",     color = "Group"   ) +   theme_minimal() +   theme(     text = element_text(size = 12),     plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", hjust = 0.5)   )

title: DSCUNIDataSets: A Comprehensive Collection of University and Engineering Datasets
text: DSCUNIDataSets package provides unified interface accessing wide range curated datasets diverse domains. Covering various topics formats, package includes clean, preloaded datasets ready immediate use R, enabling researchers, analysts, data enthusiasts explore, analyze, visualize data efficiently.

title: Authors and Citation
Authors and Citation

what: A Comprehensive Collection of University and Engineering Datasets
title: A Comprehensive Collection of University and Engineering Datasets
text: DSCUNIDataSets package offers curated collection datasets focused university engineering research, covering mechanical engineering experiments, clustering studies, engineering-related analyses. package designed support researchers, analysts, data scientists advancing understanding engineering processes data clustering techniques. datasets span various experiments studies, including mechanical engineering regression experiments analysis machine adjustments. dataset named suffix indicating structure type, making easier identify work data.

title: A Comprehensive Collection of University and Engineering Datasets
text: can install DSCUNIDataSets package directly GitHub following R function:
code: # Install devtools if not already installed install.packages("devtools")  # Install DSCUNIDataSets from GitHub devtools::install_github("lightbluetitan/dscclub-uni")

title: A Comprehensive Collection of University and Engineering Datasets
text: example datasets included DSCUNIDataSets package: mechIng_df: data frame ordered isotonic regression mechanical engineering experiments. bolts_df: data frame analyzing effects machine adjustments counting time clustering studies. Additional datasets focus various engineering processes data clustering techniques, designed facilitate advanced research, analysis, understanding.

title: A Comprehensive Collection of University and Engineering Datasets
code: # Load the package library(DSCUNIDataSets)  # Load a mechanical engineering dataset data("mechIng_df")  # View the first rows head(mechIng_df)  # Load a dataset for clustering experiments data("bolts_df")  # Display the structure of the dataset str(bolts_df)

title: Machine adjustments experiment dataset — bolts_df
text: dataset, bolts_df, data frame containing data experiment effects machine adjustments time required count bolts. includes integer factor variables representing different experimental conditions measurements.

title: Machine adjustments experiment dataset — bolts_df
Machine adjustments experiment dataset — bolts_df
text: data frame 40 observations 8 variables: RUNInteger Run identifier (integer) SPEED1Integer First speed measurement (integer) TOTALInteger Total count measurement (integer) SPEED2Integer Second speed measurement (factor 3 levels) NUMBER2Integer Number items second measurement (integer) SENSInteger Sensitivity measurement (integer) TIMEReal Time measurement (factor 40 levels) T20BOLTReal Bolt-specific measurement (factor 40 levels)

title: Machine adjustments experiment dataset — bolts_df
Machine adjustments experiment dataset — bolts_df
text: dataset name kept 'bolts_df' avoid confusion datasets R ecosystem. naming convention helps distinguish dataset part DSCUNIDataSets package assists users identifying specific characteristics. suffix 'df' indicates dataset data frame object. original content modified way.
